Use any device to watch a DIVE broadcast using an existing DIVE playlist or send us a request to create a new playlist.

Are you an existing user?
Submit your request online at: https://bit.ly/URLmapping or email us at supprt@dive-networks.com to enable your existing playlist.
Are you a new user or do you want to create a new playlist?

Submit your request online using one of the following forms:
  Home Office: https://bit.ly/dive-homeoffice
  Office: https://bit.ly/dive-office 

Create your customized News Network - DIVE aggregates data from everywhere & anywhere. Our automated sources include RSS feeds, social media networks (Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Pinterest, etc.) - these are data sources that do not require any design, moderation or curation time from you or your team.

You can also add custom sources through posts that you create and publish through the DIVE Content Management System (CMS), your intranet, trivia segments, polling, etc. - these are data sources that you and your team would author or sync with DIVE to pull in content via the CMS or an API.
